means: 内在的活动精神、动力或动机

sentence.Network_en: I am the house and Thou art the Indweller.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是房子,你是里面的居住者.

sentence.Network_en: Commune with the indweller ( God ) through meditation and heartfelt prayer.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过冥想与真切的祷告与那内在者 ( 神 ) 沟通.

sentence.Network_en: The holy spirit is the indweller of the church and its members.
sentence.Network_cn: 圣灵是教堂及其教徒的内在动力.

list.abs: study on the method to prolong indwelling time of venous indwelling needle ., 延长静脉留置针留置时间方法的研究.
nursing of infant scalp venous indwelling needle ., 小儿头皮静脉留置针的护理.

医用术语中英文对照表-梁子同志 ... industry 工业，产业 indwelling catheter 留置导尿管 inert 惰性的，无效的.
医学制药词汇英语翻译(E-L) ... industrial medicine 工业医学 indwelling catheter 留置导管 inebriety 醉癖.

means.word_mean: 1. activation by an inner spirit or force or principle;

sentences.sentence: "the Holy Spirit is the indweller of the church and its members"

means.word_mean: 2. a person who inhabits a particular place
